channel.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
channel.description:
Quick question, hoping someone might have a possible solution.
Left my lights on my car today and totally drained the battery. Got it bump started and everything's fine except one of my 6x9s doesn't seem to want to work properly. When I have music going I can hear a faint sound from it but barely anything. It was working perfectly before the power drain. I've checked all the obvious things like connections, amp, EQ etc, but can't get anything from it. Just about to go and have another fiddle around, but if anyone has any suggestions on would could of caused this then pls.
Cheerrzz
Edit - Just traced all the speaker wires back to the Head Unit and nothing wrong. I don't get this?? If I get time tonight I will quickly do a speaker swap on the amp...

item.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

I heard real men roll 6x9’s

item.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Same problem as in the same speaker didn’t work? In that case, you will probably just need to buy a new speaker.

Read full topic

item.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yeh did that and same problem, so I’m assuming the speakers blown. Will have a look at it see if I can repair, if not, just have to buy another one…

Read full topic
item.source: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain

item.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Switch the outputs on the speakers (make your right left and your left right), that will tell you pretty quick if its the output or the speaker.

I’m pretty sure it has nothing to do with a drained battery though.

Read full topic
item.source: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain

item.title: Only one 6x9 working after battery drain
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Bump started lol. How about fuses? Trying hooking a different speaker to the same wires, etc.

Read full topic
